Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik scored his maiden T20I fifty
India scored their fifth-biggest win over South Africa in T20Is
South Africa were bowled out for their lowest total in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Dinesh Karthik's performance was highlighted as a pivotal moment in the match
South Africa's line-up struggled to adapt to the pitch and India's bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lungi Ngidi's return to competitive play was noted
Temba Bavuma retired hurt with an elbow injury
Others: India won the match by 82 runs
Avesh Khan picked up four wickets including three in one over
Rishabh Pant struggled with wide deliveries and was dismissed off a slower Keshav Maharaj ball
